profile:
Centennial Windows & Doors is a family owned and operated business that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors. We sell, manufacture, install, and service our own complete line of award winning, energy efficient windows and doors.
 
Why homeowners choose Centennial Windows & Doors
 
The Best Warranty
- We provide a 100% warranty on everything we do for as long as you own your home – NO fine print and NO exclusions. And if you sell your home, it's transferable to new homeowners within 10 years of purchasing Centennial windows and doors.
 
Responsibility and Accountability
- We take full responsibility to manufacture, install, and service your windows and doors. You are dealing with ONE company only and one phone number. 
 
Proven Installation Quality
- We DO NOT hire subcontractors. All work is performed by our full time, uniformed employees, fully covered under Workers’ Compensation. Centennial Installers were the first in Canada to write the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) Fenestration Installation Technician (FIT) certification exam.
 
Leaders in Energy Efficiency
- Centennial Windows & Doors was the first window company in Canada to be ENERGY STAR® certified. We have been awarded the:
          - 2004 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award
          - 2005 – ENERGY STAR Retailer of the Year Award
          - 2008 – ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence Award
          - 2014 – ENERGY STAR Manufacturer of the Year Award – Windows and Doors
- Since 2013, our windows have been recognized as ENERGY STAR Most Efficient.
service_area: We have 13 branch areas across Ontario: Barrie, Brantford, Burlington, Chatham, Kitchener, Listowel, London, Mississauga, Sarnia, Orangeville, Owen Sound, Windsor, Oshawa and every town in between.
products: Custom residential windows and doors. Replacement vinyl windows. Premium steel and fibreglass entry door systems. Vinyl sliding patio doors. 25 standard window colours. 29 standard door colours. 4 door stains. 4 interior window coatings.
services: In-home sales directly to homeowners without the use of subcontractors. Custom window manufacturing. Custom door manufacturing. Replacement window installation. Replacement door installation. Retrofit installation. Full frame tear-out installation. Custom colour matching. In-house, expert Customer Service Technicians.

profile: EcoTech Windows & Doors has been installing energy efficient windows and doors for Ontario homeowners since 2001.  If you are ready to replace your home's windows and doors, you have found the right company.  We offer a superior product manufactured and installed to perfection at a great price.  We strive for 100% customer satisfaction ensuring our customers are happy with their order while having access to great customer service throughout the sales and installation process.  Our product line is designed to withstand Canadian climates, leaving you secure, protected and warm through the harshest winter days but cool and relaxed during the summer heat. We offer a wide selection of vinyl window styles including casement windows, awning windows, single hung and double hung windows, single slider tilt and double slider tilt windows, bay and bow windows and more. In addition to our full line of energy efficient vinyl windows, we also offer a wide selection of beautiful exterior doors in various designs and colours.  Make your home energy efficient and instantly improve your curb appeal with EcoTech Windows and Doors.  Call 1-888-901-7276 for a free in-home estimate today!

profile:
For nearly three decades the professionals at Arcana Windows and Doors have been installing the highest quality products - and providing the best service in the market today.

We pride ourselves on the long-term relationships that we have developed over the years with our many satisfied homeowners – a personalized approach that sets Arcana apart.

Arcana Windows and Doors offers a comprehensive range of services designed to meet the needs of today’s discerning homeowners. We begin by consulting with you to understand the aesthetics and the functionality you are looking to achieve.

Arcana follows all provincial COVID-19 regulations.
service_area: Hamilton, Stoney Creek, Dundas, Ancaster, Waterdown, Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Guelph, Cambridge, St. Catharines, Niagara Falls, and SURROUNDING AREA
products:
Window Installation
Door Installation
Custom Window & Door Fabrication
services:
Arcana Windows and Doors offers a comprehensive range of services designed to meet the needs of today’s discerning homeowners. We begin by consulting with you to understand the aesthetics and the functionality you are looking to achieve. 
We then work with you every step of the way to ensure your complete satisfaction through every stage of the process. Our professional installation services include:

• Replacement of existing exterior windows and doors
• Retrofitting for smaller, larger or previously non-existent openings
• Cut-outs in siding, brick and stone
• Custom window and door fabrication
• Customized finishing carpentry services

As well, we welcome the especially difficult custom projects that other window and door companies shy away from.
name: Arcana Windows & Doors Ltd

profile:
Euro Choice Windows & Doors was founded in 1998. Our company specializes in the manufacturing and installation of European style and design windows and doors, energy efficient UPVC vinyl windows, sliding doors, steel entrance doors and fibreglass doors. All Euro Choice Windows & Doors products are built to strict specifications and are regularly inspected for operation and craftsmanship. All our staff is professional and courteous with many years of experience. Since we do not use sub-contractors we have a reputation for consistency and quality. This reputation took nearly 20 years to build and we are proud to see our windows and doors in your home. 

Services: Windows Installation & Insulation
Doors Installation & Insulation

profile:
What’s it like choosing Nordik Windows for your home? It’s like a cold lemonade on a hot day, a perfect score in your golf game, or a hot cup of coffee first thing in the morning: complete satisfaction.

At Nordik Windows, we strive to be ahead of the curve when it comes to the latest and greatest in window and door technology. So, if you’re ready to give your home the upgrade it deserves, you’ve come to the right place.

Providing you with the best of the best in windows and doors has been Nordik’s passion for over 40 years. Home is where the heart is and we want you to feel like family, which is why we provide a 360-customer experience: manufacturing, installation, servicing, and one of the best warranties in the industry.

Proudly serving the Greater Toronto and Hamilton Area and beyond.
products: Replacement windows, entry doors, sliding patio doors
services:
Window Replacement
Our own RevoCell microcellular PVC windows are top-rated by Energy Star®, and have been specifically designed for the Canadian climate extremes.

Door Replacement
Our doors are modern and fully customizable. They are 100% Canadian-made and covered by our industry-leading 'No-Bull' Warranty for 25 years straight.
specialities: We're a full-service window and door replacement company: we manufacture, we install, and we service.
payment_method: ALL Major Payment types Accepted. Financing Available
warranty_terms: Our warranty is simple and it’s comprehensive — it covers products, installation and service, for 25 years straight. No excuses, no exemptions, and no fine print.
name: Nordik Windows And Doors

profile:
Everest Windows & Doors is a full-service Window & Door production, sales, and installation company. We service the following areas: Toronto, Newmarket, Aurora,  Richmond Hill, Hamilton, Vaughan, Mississauga, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Curtice, Brampton, Stoney Creek, Caledon, Orangeville, Milton, Burlington, Oakville, Guelph, Cambridge, Kitchener, Waterloo, St. Catherine, Niagara Falls, Barrie, Innisfil, Orillia, Collingwood, Wasaga Beach, Muskoka

***

Our motto is “CUSTOMER FOR LIFE”. Choosing our products and services means that you will never have to replace your windows and doors again for as long as you own your home.
We design, manufacture, and deliver better-performing windows and doors with precision and speed while providing our customers with peace of mind and an overall pleasant experience.
Our experienced team and our new manufacturing plant offer architects, contractors, and developers exciting new possibilities in window performance and design.

profile:
With 55 years in the industry, Dayside Windows and Doors is built on honesty and integrity. Our staff members are always committed to meeting and exceeding our customer’s expectations from the initial consultation through to cleaning up after installation. Because we manufacture our own windows and doors, we can guarantee their quality and back them up with a lifetime warranty. We know our products will last because that’s how we make them. 

We offer a large selection of windows and doors which are custom built for each customers needs, or create your own design to complete your dream home. Let our experienced and knowledgable team help customize the best solution for your space by optimizing design and functionality. 

Visit our website to view our windows and doors selection or contact us today for a free estimate, wwww.dayside.ca.

Contact info@dayside.ca for a free quote today.

profile:
Phantom Screens/ Ontario Screen Systems offers a beautiful alternative to traditional insect screens. Manufactured in Canada, Phantom retractable screens disappear when not in use and come in a variety of colours to match virtually any décor, all while blending in perfectly with door trim to maintaining the home’s architectural integrity. 

These screens can be cover all window types including casement, awning, single & double-hung, sliding and tilt ‘n’turn windows.

They are also customized for double french doors, swing in swing out doors, sliding doors, and oversized doors.

Motorized retractable screens by Phantom provide insect protection, climate control and solar shading without blocking your views.

Visit https://phantomscreens.ca/ and talk to a Screen Expert today.
products: All of Phantom Screens, including retractable screen doors, windows and motorized screens
services: Our trained installation technicians and the Limited Lifetime Warranty ensure that Phantom Screens last a lifetime.
specialities:
Once you've made contact with us at Ontario Screen Systems Inc., we will talk to you about your requirements and ideas you have. We’ll then take detailed measurements and prepare you an estimate. We'll also schedule an installation date with you.

Depending on how many doors and window screens you order, most installations are completed within one day. However, before we schedule an installation with you we will take into account any manufacturing lead times when ordering your screens. There are a number of installation options for our large opening (manual and motorized) screens including fully recessed and surface mounted and so the time taken for installation will vary for every project.

Our door and window screens, as well as our screens for large openings are professionally installed by Phantom-trained installers who will treat your home with care.

Call us today and experience Phantom Screens.
memberships: ACMO, BILD, CCI, CSC, MBOT, RCC
name: Phantom Screens / Ontario Screen Systems Inc.
